topics.body:
I realized something funny; I'm probably literally the only person here that needs a porn partition on my hard drive on my computer.

It's not as funny as it sound though; basically I have a whole ton of files on a external partition so that I can access them between operating systems and once in a while I accidentally click the wrong button and delete a file.  If I have all my stuff in one partition there goes everything and running file recovery on such a large system is a pain in the fucking ass to do.  What's better to do is to have several partitions and have different stuff on them so in case I accidentally delete a file it doesn't take so fucking long to recover them.  If I accidentally delete my school work I can just click, click, click and recover them in a couple minutes; on the other hand if I had everything on the same partition that would take fucking ages to recover.  If you have to recover a terabyte hard drive you're going to be there all night; if you just recover a 50gb partition that'll take like twenty minutes.
